sql: SELECT MIN(mi.info) AS movie_budget, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS movie_votes, MIN(n.name) AS writer, MIN(t.title) AS violent_liongate_movie FROM cast_info AS ci, company_name AS cn, info_type AS it1, info_type AS it2, keyword AS k, movie_companies AS mc, movie_info AS mi, movie_info_idx AS mi_idx, movie_keyword AS mk, name AS n, title AS t WHERE ci.note  in ('(writer)', '(head writer)', '(written by)', '(story)', '(story editor)') AND cn.name  like 'Lionsgate%' AND it1.info  = 'genres' AND it2.info  = 'votes' AND k.keyword  in ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital') AND mi.info  in ('Horror', 'Thriller') AND n.gender   = 'm' AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND n.id = ci.person_id AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND cn.id = mc.company_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(it1 k mi_idx it2 mk mi cn mc ci n t)
 HashJoin(k mi_idx it2 mk mi cn mc ci n t)
 HashJoin(cn mc ci n t)
 HashJoin(ci n t)
 HashJoin(ci n)
 HashJoin(cn mc)
 MergeJoin(k mi_idx it2 mk mi)
 MergeJoin(mi_idx it2 mk mi)
 NestLoop(mi_idx it2 mk)
 HashJoin(mi_idx it2)
 IndexScan(it1)
 IndexScan(k)
 BitmapScan(mi_idx)
 BitmapScan(it2)
 IndexScan(mk)
 BitmapScan(mi)
 BitmapScan(cn)
 BitmapScan(mc)
 BitmapScan(ci)
 BitmapScan(n)
 BitmapScan(t)
 Leading((it1 ((k (((mi_idx it2) mk) mi)) ((cn mc) ((ci n) t))))) */
